title: Guardians and Graves
description: Book Two in the Moonlit Wings series. Influenced by the fallen angel Mazriel and seeking to appease God, Mya Cotton agrees to stop loving her guardian angel Pershabael when her parents' graves are threatened by flood waters. Her irresponsible actions unearth forgotten remains however, and even though she vows to make things right by giving them a proper burial, when a clueless Percy shows up to help console Mya's heartbroken best friend, Mercedes, Mya can't deny her love for him. Though she doubles her efforts to forget him, her resolve is further tested when Mercedes takes it upon herself to console the heartbroken angel.
author: Beth Gualda
